mapper.select: SELECT fw.follow_id AS id, fw.follow_name AS username, i.introduction AS introduction, u.image AS avatar, CASE WHEN f.fans_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS concerned FROM ap_user_follow fw LEFT JOIN ap_user_info i ON i.user_id = fw.follow_id LEFT JOIN ap_user u ON u.id = fw.follow_id LEFT JOIN ap_user_fan f ON fw.follow_id = f.fans_id AND f.user_id = #{localID} WHERE fw.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY fw.created_time DESC LIMIT #{page},#{size}
